nodes.text: An armor corps was a formation of the Imperial Army.

An armor corps was comprised of three armored battlegroups, a mobile battlegroup, an auxiliary battlegroup, and corps headquarters. It included 74,794 personnel, 5,128 repulsorcraft, and 1,219 heavy tanks.
Armor corps could be augmented by the addition of another three more armored battlegroups, and another mobile battlegroup.
